============================QT Setup Instruction=====================

1. Make sure you download OpenCL-Headers from https://github.com/KhronosGroup/OpenCL-Headers to this or another one directory
2. Go to the Tan/tan/build/cmake folder
3. Edit generate-mac.sh with actual OpenCL folders set to this
4. Generate Makefiles by running generate-mac.sh script
5. Build Tan library and examples
